meanings.definition: A type of quilting technique that involves stuffing a design to create a raised effect.
meanings.sent1: The trapunto on the quilt made the flowers stand out beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to do trapunto quilting in her sewing class.
meanings.sent3: The trapunto on the quilt looked like little puffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her trapunto work was so intricate, it seemed like a 3D painting.
meanings.sent5: The trapunto technique made the quilt look like a textured masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The raised effect created by trapunto quilting.
meanings.sent1: The trapunto added depth and dimension to the quilt.
meanings.sent2: The trapunto design was so tactile and interesting to touch.
meanings.sent3: The trapunto effect made the quilt look like a mini mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her trapunto quilting was like adding little pillows to the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The trapunto raised effect gave the quilt a luxurious feel.
